scripts.preinstall: npm run install:client && cd server/ && npm install
scripts.build:client: cd client/ && rm -rf build/ && npm run build
scripts.build: npm run preinstall && npm run build:client && cd server/ && npm run build
scripts.build:fullstack: npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.dev:server: NODE_ENV=development cd server/ && npm run dev
scripts.dev:client: NODE_ENV=development cd client/ && npm run start
scripts.start: NODE_ENV=production cd server/ && npm run start
